price: អាលិហ្វ ឡាម រ៉។ ទាំងនោះគឺជាអាយ៉ាត់ៗនៃគម្ពីរ និងជា អាយ៉ាត់ៗគួរអានយ៉ាងច្បាស់លាស់។
arabic: الٓرۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَقُرۡءَانٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: alif-lam-ra til'ka āyātu al-kitābi waqur'ānin mubīnin
